TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WSHttpBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingBaseElement

Docs.summary: Represents an interoperable binding that supports distributed transactions and secure, reliable sessions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The wsHttpBinding is a secure, reliable, interoperable binding suitable for non-duplex service contracts. The binding implements the following specifications: WS-ReliableMessaging for reliability and WS-Security for message security and authentication. The transport is HTTP and message encoding is Text/XML encoding.
